member.name: T:CpfLibrary.Cpf
member.summary: Digit check and formatting on Brazilian Individual Taxpayer Registry (CPF).

member.name: M:CpfLibrary.Cpf.Check(System.String)
member.summary: Performs a digit check on the given number.
member.returns: True if it's a valid CPF, false otherwise

member.name: M:CpfLibrary.Cpf.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the given string with CPF mask.
member.returns: The formatted string if the formatting was sucessful, the original string if not
